compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\KKT\\Desktop\\s3 services\\se.serviceRawFile:
service: s3-signed-urls

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1

  environment:
    AWS_BUCKET_NAME: s3-bucket-operations 
    
  iamRoleStatements:   # ðŸ‘ˆ yahan S3 ke permissions dene honge
    - Effect: Allow
      Action:
        - s3:PutObject
        - s3:GetObject
        - s3:ListBucket
      Resource:
        - arn:aws:s3:::s3-bucket-operations
        - arn:aws:s3:::s3-bucket-operations/*
  # apna bucket name daalna

functions:
  getSignedUrlUpload:
    handler: handler.getSignedUrlUpload
    events:
      - http:
          path: upload-url
          method: post

  getSignedUrlGet:
    handler: handler.getSignedUrlGet
    events:
      - http:
          path: get-url
          method: get
resources:
  Resources:
    S3Bucket:
      Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
      Properties:
        BucketName: s3-bucket-operations
        PublicAccessBlockConfiguration:
          BlockPublicAcls: true
          BlockPublicPolicy: true
          IgnorePublicAcls: true
          RestrictPublicBuckets: true
